Viral Wanita Cantik di Kokpit, Petinggi Maskapai Kena Potong Gaji
07 Nov 2019, 20:20 by Kris Fathoni W


Foto: Ilustrasi pesawat (iStock)

Jakarta - Masuknya seorang wanita cantik ke kokpit pesawat tanpa izin, lalu viral, tak cuma berimbas ke pilot. Para petinggi maskapai penerbangan itu pun kena dampaknya.Seperti diberitakan sebelumnya, pilot pesawat bersangkutan sudah dilarang terbang seumur hidup oleh Air Guilin yang merupakan maskapai penerbangan tempatnya bekerja.Hukuman dijatuhkan setelah pilot tersebut ketahuan membawa masuk seorang perempuan ke dalam kokpit pesawat. Padahal, area kokpit tak boleh sembarangan dimasuki.


Wanita cantik yang dibawa masuk oleh pilot ke kokpit pesawat. (Foto: Dok. Weibo)

Kini, seperti diberitakan CNN.com yang mengutip dokumen Beijing Youth Daily, sejumlah petinggi maskapai itu pun ikut terkena hukuman akibat insiden tersebut.Disebutkan bahwa Chairman, general manager, dan direktur keselamatan dari Air Guilin termasuk ke dalam jajaran petinggi maskapai yang mendapatkan sanksi seperti pemotongan gaji dan teguran keras."Xu Xin, CEO maskapai, mendapatkan peringatan serius dan tiga bulan pemotongan gaji. General Manager Qu Taoji menerima teguran keras, tiga bulan potong gaji, dan penurunan jabatan ke tingkat manajemen yang lebih rendah," sebut CNN.com."Deputy manager dari departemen pemeliharaan Yang Wenzhong, direktur keselamatan Yin Ruiji, dan general manager dari departemen keselamatan udara Shi Ziqiao juga mendapatkan potongan gaji tiga bulan," lanjut artikel itu.Simak Video "Pesawat Pengebom Era Perang Dunia II Jatuh, 7 Orang Tewas"[Gambas:Video 20detik](krs/rdy)

Viral Beautiful Woman in the Cockpit, Airlines Officials Got Salary Cut
Nov 07 2019, 20:20 by Kris Fathoni W


Photo: Illustration of aircraft (iStock)

Jakarta - The entry of a beautiful woman into the airplane cockpit without permission, then viral, not only impact on the pilot. The airline officials were affected. As reported earlier, the pilot of the aircraft concerned has been banned from flying for life by Air Guilin, which is the airline where he works. The punishment was imposed after the pilot was found to bring a woman into the aircraft cockpit. In fact, the cockpit area must not be arbitrarily entered.


Beautiful woman brought in by the pilot to the aircraft cockpit. (Photo: Doc. Weibo)

Now, as reported by CNN.com quoting the Beijing Youth Daily documents, a number of airline officials were also affected by the punishment due to the incident. Mentioned that the Chairman, general manager, and safety director of Air Guilin are included in the ranks of airline officials who get sanctions such as cuts salary and loud reprimand. "Xu Xin, the airline's CEO, received a serious warning and three months of salary deductions. General Manager Qu Taoji received a loud rebuke, three months' salary deduction, and a demotion to a lower management level," CNN.com said. "Deputy manager of the maintenance department Yang Wenzhong, safety director Yin Ruiji, and general manager of the air safety department Shi Ziqiao also get a three-month salary deduction," continued the article.
